title: unsucessful get is not rendered appropriately

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
EDIT: no, it wasn't it, it was 46d78a8353b ~I believe #5259 may have ripped out something of relevance.~
On top of the current master, rendering of failed get commands is gone:

```
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp
❱ datalad create ds
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/ds 
[INFO   ] Scanning for unlocked files (this may take some time) 
create(ok): /tmp/ds (dataset)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp
❱ cd ds
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ echo 12345 > file ; datalad save -m "annes something"
add(ok): file (file)                                                            
save(ok): . (dataset)                                                           
action summary:                                                                 
  add (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad drop file --nocheck
drop(ok): /tmp/ds/file (file)                                                   
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad get file
CommandError: 'git annex get --json --json-error-messages --json-progress -c annex.dotfiles=true -c annex.retry=3 -- file' failed with exitcode 1 under /tmp/ds
git-annex: get: 1 failed
```

it doesn't affect successful gets:

```
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad download-url  https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/fuck_grapefruit.png    1 !
[INFO   ] Downloading 'https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/fuck_grapefruit.png' into '/tmp/ds/' 
download_url(ok): /tmp/ds/fuck_grapefruit.png (file)                            
add(ok): fuck_grapefruit.png (file)                                             
save(ok): . (dataset)                                                           
action summary:                                                                 
  add (ok: 1)
  download_url (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
d                                                                               (handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad drop fuck_grapefruit.png 
drop(ok): /tmp/ds/fuck_grapefruit.png (file) [checking https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/fuck_grapefruit.png...]
(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad get fuck_grapefruit.png
get(ok): fuck_grapefruit.png (file) [from web...]
```

and is also doesn't affect impossible gets:

```(handbook) adina@muninn in /tmp/ds on git:master
❱ datalad get a
get(impossible): /tmp/ds/a [path does not exist]

```


It works on maint:

```
datalad get file                                                          1 !
[WARNING] Running get resulted in stderr output: git-annex: get: 1 failed
 
[ERROR  ] not available; No other repository is known to contain the file. [get(/tmp/ds/file)] 
get(error): file (file) [not available; No other repository is known to contain the file.]
```
